item.title: Every Looney Tunes Movie, Ranked Worst To Best
item.description: From Space Jam and its long-awaited sequel, to Looney Tunes: Back in Action, here are the iconic cartoon characters' films ranked from worst to best.

item.title: While Waiting For Knives Out 3, Watch Netflix's New 83% RT Murder Mystery Show With A Benoit Blanc-Like Detective
item.description: Wake Up Dead Man (aka Knives Out 3) wonâ€™t be released until late 2025, but the good news is that Netflix has the best show to watch while waiting.

item.title: "So Much Good Science": The Black Hole Visuals In Christopher Nolan's $759M Oscar-Nominated Sci-Fi Movie Called "One Of The Most Accurate Depictions Of The Environment" By Expert, Who Gives It A Near-Perfect Score
item.description: Christopher Nolan's 2014 sci-fi movie gets analyzed by a real astrophysicist, who sings the movie's praises despite occasional errors.
